virtual_film_festival_title: Host a virtual festival with Openexpo!
virtual_film_festival_text: Whether you are hosting a film festival or any other kind of festival, you came to the right place. Our platform gives one all kinds of customisations and fun and simple interaction!
adding_cinemas_to_your_event_text: Our platform allows you to stream numerous movies in different schedules per so called cinema.
adding_cinemas_to_your_event_tab1: You can find all films in the “Our cinemas Tab”
adding_cinemas_to_your_event_tab2: Discuss the films or chat directly with representatives
adding_cinemas_to_your_event_tab3: From here you can either schedule meeting or start chat with them
create_schedule_for_cinema_text: Creating a schedule for a virtual cinema is important, attendees would be able to track the workshops, streamed videos or presentations
add_videos_youtube_title: Add videos from Youtube or Vimeo to your agenda
add_videos_youtube_text: A number of festival creators store their videos on services like Youtube or Vimeo. We make it possible to add a link to the vimeo video,so it can become part of the streaming schedule.
add_videos_youtube_tab1: Use Youtube or Vimeo as the video source
add_videos_youtube_tab2: Broadcast yourself through In-House video or Twitch
add_videos_youtube_tab3: Add multiple sources in one video
